Package de.oth.blocklib.world.fluids

Class ActiveFluid

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.world.fluids.ActiveFluid
public class ActiveFluid
extends java.lang.Object
A class that handles all ActiveFluidBlocks of the same type. It is used to update these ActiveFluidBlocks and defines their properties.
Author:
Tobias Mueller

  • Constructor Details

    • ActiveFluid

      public ActiveFluid​(short type, float viscosity, float updateTime, short onDestroyType)
      Creates a new type of ActiveFluid.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the fluid (e.g "lava")
      viscosity - influences how far the fluid should spread on an even surface
      updateTime - states in what intervals the fluid should be updated. A higher value results in less required performance but makes a fluid seem less liquid
      onDestroyType - defines the block type of the block that replaces a ActiveFluidBlock once it is no longer active.

    • ActiveFluid

      public ActiveFluid​(short type)

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update​(float deltaTime)
      The update method gets called by the FluidManager. It returns if the specified updateTime has not passed yet.
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - the time that has passed since the last update.
